            acc.volume_offers.push(offer);
            break;
          }
          case 'tier': {
            if (findGroupedProducts) {
              console.warn(`${prefix} Tier Price offer "${offer.name}" was hidden because the product "${productAsTarget.title}" is part of the Grouped Product.`);
              break;
            }

            acc.tier_offers.push(offer);
            break;
          }
          case 'bundle': {
            if (offer.sub_type === 'PRODUCT') {
              if (product !== null && offer.parent_product_id === null) {
                acc.bundle_product = offer;
              } else if (['OFFER_PRODUCTS', 'SPECIFIC_PRODUCTS'].includes(offer.trigger_type)) {
                if (offer.parent_product_id === null) {
                  bundle_product = offer;
                } else {
                  acc.bundle_components.push(offer);
                }
              }
            }

            if (offer.sub_type === 'BXGY') {
              acc.bxgy_offers.push(offer);
            }

            if (offer.sub_type === 'ADDONS') {
              if (findGroupedProducts) {
                console.warn(`${prefix} Add-ons offer "${offer.name}" was hidden because the product "${productAsTarget.title}" is part of the Grouped Product.`);
                break;
              }

              if (offer.items.length > 0 && offer.items[0].offers.some(offer => offer.product_id === null && offer.discounted)) {
                console.warn(`${prefix} Add-ons offer "${offer.name}" was hidden because the product "${productAsTarget.title}" is main product.`);
                break;
              }

              acc.product_addons.push(offer);
            }

            if (offer.sub_type === 'GENERAL') {
              acc.bundle_offers.push(offer);
            }

            if (offer.sub_type === 'PRODUCTS_IN_BUNDLE') {
              acc.bundle_components.push(offer);
            }
            break;
          }
        }

        return acc;
      }, {
        bundle_components: [],
        bundle_offers: [],
        bundle_product: null,
        bxgy_offers: [],
        cross_sell: [],
        upsell: [],
        product_addons: [],
        volume_offers: [],
        tier_offers: []
      });

  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;

  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;

.cart-drawer-overlay.active {

          const startDate = new Date(offer.active_dates.start);
          const endDate = new Date(offer.active_dates.start);

          if (startDate > now) {
            return false;
          }

          if (offer.end_date_enabled && endDate < now) {
            return false;
          }

          if (
            offer.type === 'bundle' &&
            offer.sub_type === 'PRODUCT' &&
            offer.parent_product_id === null
          ) {
            return true;
          }

          return offer.items.some((item) => {
            if (item.target.targeting_type === 'product' &&
                item.target.product_id !== null) {
              return false;
            }

            if (item.target.targeting_type === 'condition') {
              return targetCollectionHandles.includes(item.target.conditions[0].value);
            }

            if (item.target.targeting_type === 'collection') {
              return targetCollectionIds.includes(item.target.collection_id.toString());
            }

            return true;
          })

          return false;
        }).map((offer) => {
          if (offer.is_short) {
            for (const item of offer.items) {
              item.offers = offer.common_offers;
            }

            delete offer.is_short;
            delete offer.common_offers;
          }

          for (let index = offer.items.length - 1; index >= 0; index--) {
            const item = offer.items[index];

            if (
                (
                  item.target.targeting_type === 'product' &&
                  item.target.product_id === null
                ) ||
                (
                  item.target.targeting_type === 'condition' &&
                  item.target.conditions[0].operator === 'equals' &&
                  targetCollectionHandles.includes(item.target.conditions[0].value)
                ) || 
                (
                  item.target.targeting_type === 'collection' &&
                  targetCollectionIds.includes(item.target.collection_id.toString())
                )

              item.id = product.id;
              item.target = { ...productAsTarget, variant: item.target.variant || null };

              for (const offerItem of item.offers) {
                if (
                    offerItem.targeting_type === 'condition' && 
                    offerItem.conditions[0].operator === 'equals'
                   ) {
                    itemsCollectionHandles.push(offerItem.conditions[0].value);
                }
              }

              continue;
            }

            if (offer.sub_type !== 'ADDONS') {
              offer.items.splice(index, 1);
            }
          }

          return offer;
        });

      const uniqueCollections = itemsCollectionHandles
        .filter((item, index, arr) => arr.indexOf(item) === index);

      async function fetchProducts() {
        if (storefrontApiToken) {
          const collectionsClause = itemsCollectionHandles
            .map((handle) => {
            return `
              ${snakeToCamel(handle)}: collection(handle: "${handle}") {
                products(first: 20) {
                  nodes {
                    id
                    title
                    handle
                  }
                }
              }
            `
          }).join('\n');

          const collectionsQuery = `
